![](https://www.caldwelltx.gov/api/blob/viewBlob?i=8UBlMdkW%2FPnyWbqxJAgefgmjJPngjIez0YsOCdZ1gPdA4wEvgZczdDK14lMkv8Yw&s=xlarge)

Police Department
Police Department

Contact Information

1105 Commerce Street Caldwell, TX 77836

[979-567-4455](javascript:;)

The City of Caldwell is a growing community in the heart of the Texas Triangle on the route between bustling Bryan-College Station and the State Capitol. The Caldwell Police Department serves both residents and those traveling through town. Our Officers enjoy being an active part of the community and strives to foster strong community-based relationships within the community we serve as well as surrounding communities and other public safety agencies.

[![](../ic?i=scale&c2=transparent&c1=%2310345c&c3=%23ededed)Municipal Court](https://www.caldwelltx.gov/municipalcourt)[![](../ic?i=coffee&c2=transparent&c1=%2310345c&c3=%23ededed)Employment](https://www.caldwelltx.gov/employment)[![](../ic?i=calendar&c2=transparent&c1=%2310345c&c3=%23ededed)Department Training Schedule](javascript:;)

Mission Statement (Why are we here)
===================================

We, the members of the Caldwell Police Department, in partnership with our community will strive to reduce crime, the fear of crime and improve the quality of life by upholding laws, protecting lives and property, and providing a safe and secure environment.

Vision (Where are we headed)
============================

The vision of the Caldwell Police is to be regarded by our community and our profession as the premier law enforcement agency in the nation.

Values (How we do our business)
===============================

* Selflessness (the quality of unselfish concern for the welfare of others)
* Excellence (the quality of being exceptionally good in our service delivery)
* Respect (Willingness to show consideration, appreciation and concern for all people)
* Vigilance (careful attention, alert watchfulness of our community)
* Integrity (honesty, moral soundness)
* Collaboration (to work together/partnership)
* Ethics (a code of behavior, a set of principles of right conduct we model)

GOALS (Desired outcomes we seek)
================================

* To Reduce Crime
* To Reduce the Fear of Crime
* To Improve the Overall Quality of Life in the Community
* To Build and Maintain Effective Partnerships

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
